actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prevent evasion of the meat import law by including within the yearly quotas established thereunder meat entered into foreign trade zones and insular possessions for processing into different products before importation into the United States.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Includes within the annual meat importation quotas, meat imported into foreign trade zones and insular possessions for processing before importation into the United States.

titles.title: A bill to prevent evasion of the meat import law by including within the yearly quotas established thereunder meat entered into foreign trade zones and insular possessions for processing into different products before importation into the United States.
